channel.title: Projects on Timothy Ford
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Timothy Ford

item.title: HideOuts
item.description: The Problem Discovery of local culture can be difficult, especially if you are living in a new area or are travelling. HideOuts aims to provide a gamified way to find local places of interest and culture, thus making the process fun and interactive. The Pitch At the Fort Collins Startup Weekend, I gave the following pitch explaining core business concepts and customer development research findings: The MVP As the final project of my Mobile Development class in Spring 2020, I made a very early-stage prototype for HideOuts that demonstrated core ideas and basic functionality.

item.title: HomeMetricsLLC
item.description: Co-Founder and CTO @ HomeMetricsLLC Hi, I am Timothy Ford, one of the founding members of HomeMetricsLLC. On top of leading the project development, I also work heavily on the HomeMetrics Android App (Native Development in Kotlin) (on the Play Store soon!) as well as our backend API (Python and FastAPI hosted on GCP). Awards/Achievments Braun Inventor Award 2nd in South Dakota Giant Vision Business Competition 3rd in USD i2i Business Plan Competition

item.title: MinneMUDAC Fall 2019
item.description: Results Our team placed 3rd in the novice category. * http://minneanalytics.org/announcing-the-winners-of-the-minnemudac-2019-student-data-science-challenge/
